imageDescription: Pre-dawn twilight illuminates the sea, above which the moon hovers.
title: Dawn Elsewhere
description: Since fleeing the astral nature that devastated Nanta, a kigo (nature spirit) has adventured downriver with its otter-like, chimeric companion. After many seasons in the mountains, this kigo now finds itself alone at the coast, embarking from an irreparable world in search of a new adventure.

imageDescription: Wind spirals into a red forest, its changed leaves decorating the ground.
title: Cardinal Wind
description: Fall woods beckon the hiker with crisp air and red leaves—a domain for contentment and reflection—while technology grasps for the hiker's attention like gnarled rhododendron bushes.

imageDescription: An alpine lake basks in irridescent light below a peak that obscures the rising sun.
title: Welcome to the Regions
description: Paddling the Great River, the nature spirit of Nanta discovers natural wonders such as Roan's snowy, spruce-fir forests and Lauke's monolithic, alpine peaks. Welcome players to your game's regions with familiar, yet varied intro music.

imageDescription: Water and celestial magic spray into the air while cascading down a forested gorge.
title: Chimeric Memories
description: The chimera's celestial memories cascade downriver, freed from the corrupted sage, but not without cost. In defeating its sage, the nature spirit of Nanta also released the chimera from this world.

imageDescription: A yellow-green, birch forest obscures sunlight from a gently cascading river.
title: Sage of Summer
description: A nature-spirit chases its corrupted sage downriver, skirting this sage's heated boils of water. The insectoid Sage of Summer draws its celestial power from an escaped chimera that takes the form a black bear.

imageDescription: A water bottle lay perched against a daypack, overlooking a twilit river's bend.
title: Ascent to Dream Aerie
description: The trail guides a solitary hiker through the tail-end of summery twilight into autumn's crisp mornings. The ascent proves difficult, but wind threads the trees and accelerates this hiker's trek to a lookout.

imageDescription: Boulders dot the blue-green river dividing Nanta's pinestraw-blanketed mountainscape.
title: Autumn in Nanta
description: Autumn treats the nature-spirits of Nanta with turning the maples red, as a perennial, dividing river quenches this biome's thirst. It's no wonder these nature-spirits hardly ever leave their homeland.
